meanings.definition: A type of Middle Eastern or Mediterranean sandwich typically made with seasoned meat, vegetables, and sauce wrapped in pita bread.
meanings.sent1: I tried a delicious donairs for lunch today.
meanings.sent2: The food truck serves amazing donairs every Friday.
meanings.sent3: Why did the donairs go to the gym? To get wrapped in pita bread!
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the donairs filled the entire kitchen.
meanings.sent5: The donairs were a flavorful explosion in my mouth.

meanings.definition: The meat used in a donair sandwich, often seasoned with spices like cumin and garlic.
meanings.sent1: The donairs meat was perfectly seasoned.
meanings.sent2: The chef marinated the donairs meat overnight.
meanings.sent3: The donairs meat whispered to the veggies, 'I'm the star of the sandwich.'
meanings.sent4: The sizzle of the donairs meat on the grill was music to my ears.
meanings.sent5: The juicy donairs meat melted in my mouth with each bite.

meanings.definition: To eat or enjoy a donair sandwich.
meanings.sent2: I always donairs slowly to savor the flavors.
meanings.sent3: The friends decided to donairs together at the picnic.
meanings.sent4: She donairs with such enthusiasm that sauce dripped down her chin.
meanings.sent5: I can't wait to donairs at my favorite restaurant this weekend.
